languages.text: {n}Энергетическая установка на плечах Паскаля испускает сноп искр, прожигающих в алом балахоне дыры.{/n} "Акт самопожертвования. Я ликвидирую информацию о данной технологии и способах ее воспроизводства. Выжгу ее из своих нейронных цепей. Ее — и все, что к ней привело. Амарната больше не будет. Останется только его увечный осколок — Паскаль Ханейманн".

{n}A shower of sparks bursts from the power unit on Pasqal's shoulders, burning holes in his scarlet hood.{/n} "An act of self-sacrifice. I will destroy the data concerning this technology and the methods of reproducing it. I will burn it out of my neural circuits. Along with everything that led to its creation. Amarnat will be no more. Only a damaged and incomplete shard of him will remain: Pasqal Haneumann."
languages.original_text: {n}Энергетическая установка на плечах Паскаля испускает сноп искр, прожигающих в алом балахоне дыры.{/n} "Акт самопожертвования. languages.text: {n}火花の雨がパスカルの肩にある電源ユニットから降り注ぎ、緋色のフードに焼け穴を作る。{/n}「自殺行為に等しい。この技術と、その複製方法に関するデータを破壊する。私の神経回路にあるデータを焼き尽くすということだ。その創造物を生み出した何もかもを一緒に焼き尽くす。アマルナトは消滅する。損傷を負った不完全なアマルナトの破片だけが残る。すなわち、パスカル・ヘニュマンだけが」
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the power unit on Pasqal's shoulders, burning holes in his scarlet hood.{/n} "An act of self-sacrifice. I will destroy the data concerning this technology and the methods of reproducing it. I will burn it out of my neural circuits. Along with everything that led to its creation. Amarnat will be no more. Only a damaged and incomplete shard of him will remain: Pasqal Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: {n}火花の雨がパスカルの肩にある電源ユニットから降り注ぎ、緋色のフードに焼け穴を作る。{/n}「自殺行為に等しい。この技術と、その複製方法に関するデータを破壊する。私の神経回路にあるデータを焼き尽くすということだ。その創造物を生み出した何もかもを一緒に焼き尽くす。アマルナトは消滅する。損傷を負った不完全なアマルナトの破片だけが残る。すなわち、パスカル・ヘニュマンだけが」

languages.text: {n}一串火花从动力装置中喷出，落在帕斯卡的肩膀上，在他猩红色的兜帽上烧出了几个窟窿。{/n}“这是一种自我牺牲的行为。与这项技术有关的所有数据，以及复刻它的方法都将被销毁。我会把它从我的神经回路中烧掉，它所诞生的一切也会毁灭。阿玛纳特将不复存在，只剩下他的残缺碎片——帕斯卡·哈努曼。”
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the power unit on Pasqal's shoulders, burning holes in his scarlet hood.{/n} "An act of self-sacrifice. I will destroy the data concerning this technology and the methods of reproducing it. I will burn it out of my neural circuits. Along with everything that led to its creation. Amarnat will be no more. Only a damaged and incomplete shard of him will remain: Pasqal Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: {n}一串火花从动力装置中喷出，落在帕斯卡的肩膀上，在他猩红色的兜帽上烧出了几个窟窿。{/n}“这是一种自我牺牲的行为。与这项技术有关的所有数据，以及复刻它的方法都将被销毁。我会把它从我的神经回路中烧掉，它所诞生的一切也会毁灭。阿玛纳特将不复存在，只剩下他的残缺碎片——帕斯卡·哈努曼。”

languages.text: {n}L'unité motrice de Pasqal crache une pluie d'étincelles qui viennent brûler des petits trous dans sa capuche écarlate.{/n} « Un acte de sacrifice de soi. Je vais détruire toutes les données concernant cette technologie et ses méthodes de production. Je vais griller mes circuits neuronaux pour faire disparaître ces informations et tout ce qui a pu mener à sa création. Amarnat ne sera plus. Il n'en survivra qu'un fragment incomplet et endommagé : Pasqal Haneumann. »
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the power unit on Pasqal's shoulders, burning holes in his scarlet hood.{/n} "An act of self-sacrifice. I will destroy the data concerning this technology and the methods of reproducing it. I will burn it out of my neural circuits. Along with everything that led to its creation. Amarnat will be no more. Only a damaged and incomplete shard of him will remain: Pasqal Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'unité motrice de Pasqal crache une pluie d'étincelles qui viennent brûler des petits trous dans sa capuche écarlate.{/n} « Un acte de sacrifice de soi. Je vais détruire toutes les données concernant cette technologie et ses méthodes de production. Je vais griller mes circuits neuronaux pour faire disparaître ces informations et tout ce qui a pu mener à sa création. Amarnat ne sera plus. Il n'en survivra qu'un fragment incomplet et endommagé : Pasqal Haneumann. »

languages.text: {n}La unidad de poder de los hombros de Pasqal expulsa una lluvia de chispas, creando agujeros en su capucha escarlata.{/n} «Un acto de sacrificio personal. Destruiré los datos sobre esta tecnología y los diferentes métodos de reproducirla. La eliminaré de mis circuitos neurales, junto con todo lo que llevó a su creación. Amarnat dejará de existir. Solo permanecerá un fragmento dañado e incompleto de él: Pasqal Haneumann».
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the power unit on Pasqal's shoulders, burning holes in his scarlet hood.{/n} "An act of self-sacrifice. I will destroy the data concerning this technology and the methods of reproducing it. I will burn it out of my neural circuits. Along with everything that led to its creation. Amarnat will be no more. Only a damaged and incomplete shard of him will remain: Pasqal Haneumann."

traits.locale_text: {n}La unidad de poder de los hombros de Pasqal expulsa una lluvia de chispas, creando agujeros en su capucha escarlata.{/n} «Un acto de sacrificio personal. Destruiré los datos sobre esta tecnología y los diferentes métodos de reproducirla. La eliminaré de mis circuitos neurales, junto con todo lo que llevó a su creación. Amarnat dejará de existir. Solo permanecerá un fragmento dañado e incompleto de él: Pasqal Haneumann».

languages.text: {n}Ein Funkenschauer schießt aus der Energieeinheit auf Pasqals Schulter und brennt Löcher in seine rote Kapuze.{/n} "Ein Akt der Selbstaufopferung. Ich werde die Daten zu dieser Technologie und zu ihrer Herstellung zerstören. Ich werde sie aus meinen Neuralkreisen brennen. Und auch alles, was zu ihrer Schöpfung geführt hat. Amarnat wird nicht mehr sein. Nur ein beschädigter und unvollständiger Splitter wird zurückbleiben: Pasqal Haneumann."
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the power unit on Pasqal's shoulders, burning holes in his scarlet hood.{/n} "An act of self-sacrifice. I will destroy the data concerning this technology and the methods of reproducing it. I will burn it out of my neural circuits. Along with everything that led to its creation. Amarnat will be no more. Only a damaged and incomplete shard of him will remain: Pasqal Haneumann."

Ich werde die Daten zu dieser Technologie und zu ihrer Herstellung zerstören. Ich werde sie aus meinen Neuralkreisen brennen. Und auch alles, was zu ihrer Schöpfung geführt hat. Amarnat wird nicht mehr sein. Nur ein beschädigter und unvollständiger Splitter wird zurückbleiben: Pasqal Haneumann."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın omuzlarındaki güç ünitesinden kıvılcımlar fışkırıyor, kızıl kapüşonu yanarak deliniyor.{/n} "Bir kendini feda etme eylemi. Bu teknolojiyle ve onu yeniden üretme metotlarıyla ilgili veriyi yok edeceğim. Yaratımına yol açan her şeyle birlikte nöral devrelerimden yakıp atacağım. Artık Amarnat var olmayacak. Yalnızca onun hasarlı ve yarım bir parçası kalacak: Pasqal Haneumann."
languages.original_text: {n}A shower of sparks bursts from the power unit on Pasqal's shoulders, burning holes in his scarlet hood.{/n} "An act of self-sacrifice. I will destroy the data concerning this technology and the methods of reproducing it. I will burn it out of my neural circuits. Along with everything that led to its creation. Amarnat will be no more. Only a damaged and incomplete shard of him will remain: Pasqal Haneumann."
